description.oldValue:
,Previously, cloud attachments worked only for links shared using the attachments button in Outlook and Microsoft Teams. Now, cloud attachments will retain files shared as hyperlinks in the body of an email or Teams message.
GA date: April CY2023
Preview date: February CY2023
description.newValue:
,Previously, cloud attachments worked only for links shared using the attachments button in Outlook and Microsoft Teams. Now, cloud attachments will retain files shared as hyperlinks in the body of an email or Teams message.
GA date: April CY2023
Preview date: March CY2023
